entry.title: Adjustments
entry.summary:
Author: gingerandcinnamon07

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,774Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: After a mission helping Constantine goes awry, you and Jason now have to navigate him being bitten by a werewolf (yes) and all the small, or large, adjustments that come with that. While Constantine works to find a reversal — after all, he got you all into this mess and portal-hopping-lycanthropes weren’t in the mission briefing — the two of you try to just take it all business as usual. Course that’s pretty difficult when there’s a whole family of bats getting in the way, Jason starts getting growly, and you’re fairly certain that this is all some weird fever dream. What could go wrong?

entry.summary:
Author: Strayjoysz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,637Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

entry.title: frankenstein
entry.summary:
Author: floricita

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,365Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: jason todd is pretty sure he died. he remembers the joker, his mother, the bomb ticking, the explosion. he remembers dying. that's why he's confused when he wakes up one day, breathing, heart pumping, and buried six feet under. he's alive. and he doesn't know how. let alone why. but one things for certain, he needs to climb his way out of this grave before he experiences death twice. or… in which, you find someone crawling out of their grave and nearly have a heart attack. — she!reader / jason todd— set during the rh:utrh (comic)— lowercase intended— can also be found on wattpad!

entry.title: and if i break (could i go on break?)
entry.summary:
Author: artemissrx6

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,857Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: Jason has been on you for weeks now, brows scrunching up in concern and confusion each time you dropped off case work for him, or joined him on patrol; the look of you something to behold, for sure. You wouldn't know, you haven't replaced the last one you broke. There are signs, always, of an upcoming tidal wave crashing into you with full force — life gets more and more blurry, everything becoming mechanical and lacking of any substance, and you barely function like a human being.

entry.title: Follow The Leader
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,767Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 60

Summary: You were no hero nor vigilante, but you played your own role, assisting those who lived on the streets just like yourself. You would occasionally take on a dirty job of some description, whether that was a drug run, a stint in a brothel, whatever it took to get your hands on money. Then, you’d take your cut, disappear a while, and go around Gotham offering food, water, warm blankets, and other necessities to those who needed them. Children, adults, dirty, clean, old, young, didn’t matter to you. If they needed help, they got it. When some thugs come for revenge for a drug run gone wrong, you are saved by the Red Hood. But, as you are a criminal yourself, you are terrified of what he might do to you. He wants to show you he has no intention to hurt you.
